flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Sketchup Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • 3/4" Galvanized Nuts (3)
  • 3/4" Steel Nuts (2)
guide.introduction_rendered:
Sketchup Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • 3/4" Galvanized Nuts (3)
  • 3/4" Steel Nuts (2)
Tools
  • Welder

lines.text: One is for the main frame, and one goes in the primary arms.
lines.text_raw: One is for the main frame, and one goes in the primary arms.

lines.text: Weld the rebar to the threaded rod at a right angle.
lines.text_raw: Weld the rebar to the threaded rod at a right angle.

lines.text: Protect the threads on the threaded rod by welding. (A small pipe works well)
lines.text_raw: Protect the threads on the threaded rod by welding. (A small pipe works well)

lines.text: Weld the 1" pipe to the 3" U-channel, in the center. 4-8 good tacks is sufficient.
lines.text_raw: Weld the 1" pipe to the 3" U-channel, in the center. 4-8 good tacks is sufficient.

lines.text: Make (2) 6" long 3/4" bolts, by using a nut and 6.25" of threaded rod. See Making Bolts.
lines.text_raw: Make (2) 6" long 3/4" bolts, by using a nut and 6.25" of threaded rod. See [http://opensourceecology.org/wiki/Making_Bolts|Making Bolts.]

lines.text: Weld the flatbar to the 1.25" piece of threaded rod.
lines.text_raw: Weld the flatbar to the 1.25" piece of threaded rod.

lines.text: Make sure they are perfectly paralell!
lines.text_raw: Make sure they are perfectly paralell!

lines.text: Thread a nut onto the threaded rod.
lines.text_raw: Thread a nut onto the threaded rod.

guide.summary: Add small components to your Compressed Earth Brick Press.
guide.title: CEB Main Frame: Small Components
